text: Humne unpar aisey saathi musallat kardiye thay jo unhein aagey aur peechey har cheez khushnuma banakar dikhate thay. Aakhir e kaar unpar bhi wahi faisla e azaab chaspan ho kar raha jo un se pehle guzray huey Jinno aur Insano ke girohon par chaspan ho chuka tha, yaqeenan woh khasare (loss) mein reh jaane waley thay
